ontologyFramework.OFEventManagement.OFTimeTriggerManagement

Class OFTimeTriggerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ontologyFramework.OFEventManagement.OFTimeTriggerManagement.OFTimeTriggerBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OFBuilderInterface<OFTimeTriggerDefinition>

    public class OFTimeTriggerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements OFBuilderInterface<OFTimeTriggerDefinition>
    This class, as all the class that implements OFBuilderInterface has the proposes to initialize classes to be used during system evolution. In this case its initializes Trigger relate to Time, in particular the classes: OFTimeTriggerDefinition.

    A call to buildInfo(String[], OWLReferences, OFBuildedListInvoker) causes the reset of the initialized classes Map, then all the individual inside the ontological class, named keyWord[ 0] (by default: "OFTimeTrigger") are processed. Where, The definition of this class must be: (hasTimeTriggerDefinition exactly 1 TimeTriggerDefinition) and (implementsOFTimeTriggerName exactly 1 Name)

    For all of them it gets the name of the trigger implementation as the fully qualifyer if the class that implement it. This retrieved thanks to the object property named keyWord[ 1], (by default: "implementsOFTimeTriggerName"). Than, the method retrieve the definiton of the trigger as the string value of the object property named: keyWord[ 3] (by default, "hasTypeTimeTriggerDefinition") attached to an individual that is linked to this one trhougth the object property named keyWord[ 2] (by default: "hasTimeTriggerDefinition"). Where, the parsing procedure of the text are hinnerated from OFEventBuilder. As well as the managament of its parameter are managed by OFEventParameterDefinition

    The call to the method getInitialisedClasses() after called initializeDefinition(OWLNamedIndividual, OFTimeTriggerDefinition, OWLReferences)} returns a HashMap<String, OFTimeTriggerDefinition> where, keys are the names of the individuals belong to the class named keyWord[ 0]. While the values are the classes which represent and allow to compute all the temporal triggers available during the calling of initializeDefinition(OWLNamedIndividual, OFTimeTriggerDefinition, OWLReferences).

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Buoncomapgni Luca

      During initialization phase, OFInitialiser calls OFBuilderInterface.buildInfo(String[], OWLReferences, OFBuildedListInvoker) first and than retries the initialized Map from this method.

      • buildInfo

        public void buildInfo(java.lang.String[] keywords,
             OWLReferences ontoRef,
             OFBuildedListInvoker listInvoker)
        Description copied from interface: OFBuilderInterface
        Given references to the ontology, already initialized classes and key words it discover the ontology to retrieve information and initialize other classes. A call to this method should clear all stored variables that are used in OFBuilderInterface.getInitialisedClasses()
        Specified by:
        buildInfo in interface OFBuilderInterface<OFTimeTriggerDefinition>
        Parameters:
        keywords - retrieved by OFBuilderCommon.getKeyWords(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual, OWLReferences)
        ontoRef - reference to the ontology which contains the builder individual
        listInvoker - references to already initialized classes from OFInitialiser

      • getInitialisedClasses

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,OFTimeTriggerDefinition> getInitialisedClasses()
        Description copied from interface: OFBuilderInterface
        During initialization phase, OFInitialiser calls OFBuilderInterface.buildInfo(String[], OWLReferences, OFBuildedListInvoker) first and than retries the initialized Map from this method. Its returning value is add to the Map managed by OFBuildedListInvoker with key value given by OFBuilderCommon.getBuildedListName(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual, OWLReferences).
        Specified by:
        getInitialisedClasses in interface OFBuilderInterface<OFTimeTriggerDefinition>
        Returns:
        initialisedMap a Map which contains the initialized classes linked to a key (by default it is of type String}
